snippet.title: Seekers of Skyveil | Official Beta Trailer
snippet.description:
JOIN THE BETA: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2402420/?utm_source=youtube&utm_campaign=betatrailer&utm_medium=YTdescription

In the world of Seekers, everyone is on the hunt. Many are on a mission to get loot and get out. Others are on a quest to take down the biggest bounties. And some are simply out for blood.

Keep your finger on the trigger and a hand on the hilt – you never know what will come at you next.

Seekers of Skyveil is a fantasy RPG that puts a new spin on the extraction genre. It combines the rush of extraction with heroes, teamfights, and a vibrant world to explore. Collect magical gear, customize your weapons, and upgrade your base as you grow more powerful each match.

💫 JANUARY 2025: Extended Playtest
January 10 to January 19
4pm to 10pm PST daily

🌟 FEBRUARY 2025: Steam Next Fest
February 24 to March 3
24/7 servers

🌠 MARCH 2025: Early Access
24/7 servers

Join our Discord: https://discord.gg/playseekers 💜
